Title: 37229 - # Affordable DIY Projects to Make Your Home More Comfortable
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 affordable cheap DIY projects that someone could do to make their home more comfortable. Your resource links provide numerous options such as building your own headboard, using crates to make an end table, and re-purposing old furniture. Make sure the projects you discuss are easy and affordable. Your target audience is interested in home décor and DIY. You can link to your target URL by suggesting using hooks around your home for organization or for decoration.
